original_title: A Lion Is in the Streets
overview: A charismatic peddler from the bayous finds his true calling in politics. Is he a demagogue in the making?
tagline: THE ROARING STORY OF A GIVE-AND-TAKE GUY! He took plenty from the chiselers...the crooks...and the tin-horns...and gave 'em nothing in return!
title: A Lion Is in the Streets
